title: Categorize Image: Selfie
description: Select the category that best describes this image:

options.name: Selfie
options.description: A self-portrait; note that sometimes a selfie photo is taken on a mirror.

options.name: NOT a selfie
options.description: Photo was taken by another person.

options.name: Cannot determine
options.description: Cannot tell whether the photo is a selfie or not.
